member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintExtensionContext
member.summary: Provides the context for the printer extension object.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintExtensionContext.FromDeviceId(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the context for the printer extension object based on the DeviceInformation ID.
member.param: The device information ID for the print device.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintNotificationEventDetails
member.summary: Contains properties that allow a client to access and/or manipulate print event data and print device name information.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintNotificationEventDetails.EventData
member.summary: Gets or sets the event data for a print notification event.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintNotificationEventDetails.PrinterName
member.summary: Gets the name of the print device associated with the print notification.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfiguration
member.summary: Allows a client to retrieve the print task extension context, and also to add an event handler to the print task.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfiguration.PrinterExtensionContext
member.summary: Gets the context for the print task extension.
member.returns: The context for the print task extension.

member.name: E:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfiguration.SaveRequested
member.summary: Raised by the print window for your app to notify the device app that the print ticket must be updated.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequest
member.summary: Called when the print dialog for your app raises a SaveRequested event.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequest.Deadline
member.summary: Gets the date-time object that provides the deadline information for the print task.
member.returns: The deadline for the print task.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequest.Cancel
member.summary: Called by the device app to cancel the client's request to save the print task configuration.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequest.GetDeferral
member.summary: Called by the device app when it has to complete some asynchronous tasks before it can save the print task configuration information.
member.returns: The object that represents the deferral for the print task configuration save request.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequest.Save(System.Object)
member.summary: Called by the device app to save the print task configuration.
member.param: The object that represents the print task extension context.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequestedDeferral
member.summary: Called by the device app to provide an update of the status of the deferral.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequestedDeferral.Complete
member.summary: Called by the device app when the deferral is completed.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequestedEventArgs
member.summary: Called to notify the device app that the print task configuration must be saved.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Extensions.PrintTaskConfigurationSaveRequestedEventArgs.Request
member.summary: Gets the information that is required for updating the print task configuration.
member.returns: The print task configuration save request.
